description: T01- Norway Maple(Acer platanoides) reduce growth near to corner of the building (near main entrance) by up to 1.5m to ensure 2m clearance; T04 - Lime(Tilia sp.) Remove basal and stem epicormic growth to 2.5m agl;T05 - London Plane(Platanus x hispanica) Reduce limb by up to 2m to reduce weight and sail of limb, Reduce tertiary branch at 18m (SW section of canopy) by 2m;T09 - Japanese Maple(Acer palmatum) Reduce from buildings by 0.5m;T22 - Norway Maple(Acer platanoides) Prune away from floodlight and column to by up to 1.5m;T30 - Common Holly(Ilex aquifolium) Reduce from structure by 0.5m. Raise low canopy To 3.0m agl over public footpath;T32 - Plum(Prunus domestica) Prune away from building by up to 1m to ensure 1m clearance and lift to 3m agl over public footpath;T34 Common Holly(Ilex aquifolium) Raise low canopy To 3.0m agl over public footpath;T35 Lime(Tilia sp.) lift or remove regrowth to achieve 4m clearance agl over the road;T38 Lime(Tilia sp.) Raise low canopy To 4.0m over the road;T41 Lime(Tilia sp.) Reduce N stem (over the footpath and road) by up to 2 metres to reduce weight and sail. Remove basal growth;T45. Lime(Tilia sp.) Remove basal epicormic growth, lift over driveway to ensure 4m clearance;T46 Lime(Tilia sp.) Remove basal epicormic growth, lift over driveway to ensure 4m clearance;T57 Black Mulberry(Morus nigra) Raise low canopy To 2.0m;T59 Lime(Tilia sp.) Crown reduction to previous points but leaving suitable growth at reduction points and not thinning inner canopy growth;T65 Elder(Sambucus nigra) Reduce S heading stem by up to 2m to reduce weight and sail;
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
